Malice:

The seemingly captive Malice sheathed his weapons and rushed the force field, slamming his claws intot he barrier and breifly clawing at it with the same skull grin.

"Give you?  You always want something, you are so needy," he said as he slowly began to drain power from the field.  "You're not content with battle, or the hunt, you need to have something physical to validate yourself.  Ha.  A good body count is all it takes to make me happy.  It makes Megatron happy too.  And today, he will have one too."



----- Original Message ----
From: xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...>
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, April 14, 2008 1:00:25 PM
Subject: Re: Black Fortress

Perceptor:

"Ok" said dryly the male

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com, "supercyclonus" <supercyclonus@ ...> 
wrote:
>
> Myrmidon frowned as Malice spoke. For a moment Myrmidon felt a 
flicker of respect for Malice, but then as he only ended with vague 
threats and his face assumed a new configuration, the flicker of 
respect died.
> 
> "We will deal with Unicron soon enough, but unless you have 
something to give us, I am satisfied with you here behind this force 
shield."
> 
> Myrmidon glanced at Perceptor, "He is locked behind a force shield. 
Guard him while I go to help in he battle."
> 
> Preston 
> (Myrmidon)
> 
>

Malice said simply. His face plating seemed to liquify, and receed 
back into his helmet, leaving a shiny metal skull grinning, with two 
red glowing eyes.

what

> > > already here?" Myrmidon grunted, "Battle? War? There is all we 
can 
> > find
> > > several stories above our heads." Myrmidon said, speaking about 
the
> > > battle going on outside. "Do you bring honor and power, or just

> > > > 
> > > > Myrmidon stood looking at the door for a long moment, part of 
him
> > > > wanting to open the door and jump into the battle that no 
doubt
> > > > waited
> > > > for him on the other side of the door, and yet something else
> > > > screamed
> > > > caution at him. Why would someone rush headlong into an enemy 
> > base,
> > > > knowing that they would quickly bring to bear all the security
> > > > measures
> > > > that had on the intruder.
> > > > 
> > > > Pressing button on the control panel beside the room door he 
> > checked
> > > > the condition of the room. The result was of course a single
> > > > occupant,
> > > > and that the room was totally shielded and powered down. So 
the 
> > room
> > > > that could be an arena for battle was now doubling for a 
temporary
> > > > cell. 
> > > > 
> > > > "Perceptor" Myrmidon called over the short range intrabase
> > > > communications, "Report to my location, I believe I have our 
> > intruder
> > > > pinned."
> > > > 
> > > > As Myrmidon waited went back to staring at the door as he 
crossed 
> > his
> > > > arms over his massive chest, his optics 
> > narrowing. "DECEPTICON! !" He
> > > > called through the door to malice, "You were a fool to enter 
this
> > > > base.
> > > > What are you looking for?"
> > > > 
> > > > Preston
> > > > (Myrmidon)
> > > >

to

classic

and

a

hole 
> > of a
> > > > > room, Myrmidon smiled. "Good, you have trapped yourself. 
There 
> > are
> > > > no
> > > > > other doors here." He nodded as he heard the bulkheads 
dropping
> > > > down

chest. "Erect a
> > > > > maximum
> > > > > strength forceshield around ante cabin 447 and deactivate
